document_data.name: Julen Serrat
document_data.mainbody: '''Julen Serrat''' was a young [[rogue]] and member of the Guardians branch of [[House Serrat]] of [[Delzimmer]].  As the youngest son of his branch of the Serrats, Julen stood to inherit very little.  His father [[Ramul Serrat|Ramul]] intended to apprentice him to one of his brothers who traded with [[drow]] and [[dwarf|dwarves]] in the [[Underdark]].
document_data.Abilities: Julen was trained by his family in skills such as lockpicking and poisoning.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|1105}}  Julen had some immunity to poisons because he took small doses of poisons daily from age four.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|3288}}  He was an accomplished knife fighter.
document_data.Relationships: Julen had a crush on his older cousin [[Zaltys Serrat|Zaltys]] and secretly wished to marry her,{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|1313}}  which, because Zaltys was adopted, would have been legal according to Serrat family rules.
